document_data.caption: A map a portion of Cormyr showing the town of Moonever.
document_data.name: Moonever
document_data.mainbody: '''Moonever''' was a small town found along the eastern banks of the [[Starwater River]] near [[Marsember]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Activities: Moonever supplied [[oyster]]s to the inland communities around the Starwater, rolling their ice carts along the roads and paths to nearby settlements.
document_data.Inhabitants: The population of Moonever in [[1368 DR]] was 800.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Hobble's Hooks]]

* As of {{yearlink|1356}},{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} [[Sabrast Windriver]] had a yacht moored there.{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|209|14}}
